meta.summary: Returns the atan2 value of the passed arguements.

html:div.p: The math:atan2 function returns the angle ( in radians ) from the X axis to a point (y,x).
Value1 is a number arguement cooresponding to y of point (y,x).
Value2 is a number arguement cooresponding to x of point (y,x).
If the passed number arguements is empty, then NaN is returned.
